    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method initializes the ModifyProduct controller after root element has been processed.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - Resolves relative paths for root object, or null if location is not known.
      resourceBundle - Resources used to localize root object, or null if root object was not localized.

    • onAddButtonClick

      public void onAddButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method adds selected item to partsList.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is triggered by clicking Add button.

    • onRemoveButtonClick

      public void onRemoveButtonClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method removes part from partsList, after confirming that the user wants it to be removed.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is triggered by clicking Remove button.

    • onSaveClick

      public void onSaveClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method take information from text fields (edited or not) and partsList and uses them to generate a new product, with appropriate exceptions being thrown when fields are filled in incorrectly. This method invokes windowloader method in order to return to previous window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The actionEvent generated by the Save button being clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onCancelClick

      public void onCancelClick(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      This method cancels and progress made in current window, and returns to previous window.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - actionEvent is triggered by clicking cancel button.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getPartsResultsHandler2

      public void getPartsResultsHandler2(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      This method allows users to search for parts in Inventories allParts list, and searches for a parts name (or partial name) and ID.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - This actionEvent is generated by searching (i.e. hitting Return / Enter) in the search bar.
